english.Name: Resting
english.Desc: An activity that requires you to stay in a relaxed position. Examples: Sitting down and sleeping.

filipino.Name: Nagpapahinga
filipino.Desc: Isang aktibidad kung saan kayo ay nanatili sa nakarelaks na posisyon. Halimbawa: Nakaupo at natutulog.

english.Name: Mostly Standing
english.Desc: An activity that requires you to mostly stay in an idle position. Examples: Talking while teaching a class, and waiting for a bus stop.

filipino.Name: Kadalasang Nakatayo
filipino.Desc: Isang aktibidad kung saan kayo ay nanatili sa nakatayong posisyon ng matagalan. Halimbawa: Nagtuturo o naghihintay sa paradahan.

english.Name: Light Movement
english.Desc: An activity that requires little or no effort to exert. Examples: walking, strolling down the street, and grocery shopping.

filipino.Name: Madaling Aktibidad
filipino.Desc: Isang aktibidad kung saan kayo ay gumagamit ng konti walang lakas. Halimbawa: Naglalakad at pagbili ng mga grocery.

english.Name: Heavy Movement
english.Desc: An activity that requires moderate to maximum effort to exert. Examples: running, exercising in a gym, and swimming.

filipino.Name: Mahihirap na Aktibidad
filipino.Desc: Isang aktibidad kung saan kayo ay gumagamit ng lakas. Halimbawa: Tumatakbo, ehersisyo at paglalangoy.
